My Work

Personal Dashboard

Chrome extension for focused productivity with real-time updates. API Integration includes Unsplash for nature images and CoinGecko for crypto data, using JSON for API responses. Real-Time Clock updates every second. Geolocation Weather uses OpenWeatherMap API for weather and city details. Dynamic Backgrounds from Unsplash enhance visuals. Developed with Vite build tool.

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • VITE & JSON
Visit Site →

Password Generator

This React app creates secure passwords by combining an array of characters, including letters, digits, and symbols. It employs 'passwordlength' and Math.floor and Math.random to ensure password complexity. The user interface offers a button to generate passwords, enhancing security with its dynamic approach.

  • JavaScript
  • React
  • CSS
  • HTML
Visit Site →

Meme Generator

This app utilizes React to create and customize memes. It allows users to input top and bottom text, and then fetches a random meme image from an API. React's state management handles text inputs and image fetching. The user-friendly interface, built with components like 'Header' and 'Meme', enables seamless meme creation with an ever-changing array of images.

  • React
  • JavaSCript
  • API
  • CSS
Visit Site →

Tenzies game

This app is powered by React, a JavaScript library for creating user interfaces. It brings dynamic interactivity to the game, letting players roll dice and freeze them to achieve matching values. The Confetti library adds a celebratory touch upon winning, and nanoid is used for generating unique IDs. The app's component-based structure ensures seamless gameplay and a user-friendly experience.

  • React
  • JavaScript ES6
  • CSS
  • Node.js
Visit Site →

Kennel Website

Our Boxer Kennel Website is powered by a robust tech stack, featuring JavaScript, React, and Node.js. This combination of modern web technologies ensures an engaging and responsive user experience. Our platform caters to Boxer breeders and enthusiasts, offering a user-friendly interface to manage kennel operations and foster connections within the Boxer community.

  • React
  • JavaScript ES6
  • CSS
  • Node.js
Visit Site →

PollyGlot Translate app openAI

PollyGlot, driven by React and OpenAI's GPT-4, redefines translation with a user-centric design and cutting-edge technology. This dynamic app facilitates effortless text input and real-time translations. Responsive and intuitive, PollyGlot ensures a consistent, visually appealing experience across devices. Its power lies in the synergy of React's versatility and GPT-4's nuanced language processing.

  • React
  • OpenAI API (GPT-4)
  • JavaScript (ES6+)
  • HTML/CSS
  • Vite
Visit Site →

About Me

I am a passionate web developer and designer. My true joy lies in creating applications that tackle real-world challenges, all while offering a delightful user experience. My areas of expertise encompass JavaScript, React, and CSS, allowing me to bring innovative digital solutions to life.

Drawing from a diverse background in customs clearance and transportation, I possess a strong foundation in this field. My educational journey includes a degree from a High Mechanical school, along with comprehensive training as a Freight Forwarder. Beyond my tech pursuits, I also nurture a dedicated interest in managing a boxer dog kennel, showcasing my multifaceted passions.
